body_html:
@PabloDIGITS

The problem was about the arch right?

Yes. That's right.

-- What is the -E arg does?

The "-E" option inherits environment variables.

for installing will affect to acces the library with a script executed without sudo permissions
that other modules installed without sudo can acces to tensoflow?

Use "sudo" only during installation.
The only caveat is that it will not work unless cuda 9.0 is installed with Jet Pack.
I failed because I introduced Jet Pack 3.1 + cuda 8.0.

body:
@PabloDIGITS 
>The problem was about the arch right?

Yes. That's right.

>-- What is the -E arg does?

The "-E" option inherits environment variables.

>for installing will affect to acces the library with a script executed without sudo permissions
>that other modules installed without sudo can acces to tensoflow?

Use "sudo" only during installation.
The only caveat is that it will not work unless cuda 9.0 is installed with Jet Pack.
I failed because I introduced Jet Pack 3.1 + cuda 8.0.
